specialties:
Fine jewellery valuations  
Services: Insurance assessments

content.about:
Ultra Jewellers provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine jewellery valuations  
Services: Insurance assessments. With Extensive industry experience experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Edmonton area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Sarah A.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Emily C.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Emily T.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

Services: Insurance assessments. With Extensive industry experience experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Edmonton area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Susan A.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Design Jewellers delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Michael C.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Elizabeth B.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Design Jewellers's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Jessica J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Jennifer T.
reviews.content: Design Jewellers's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.
